attributes.action: Let pupils go to school on Monday and Friday in non uniform
attributes.additional_details: Parents are getting stressed out over trying to get their children’s school uniform on paticually on Monday and Fridays so it would make their life easier if it was non uniform on these days
attributes.background: On a Monday parents struggle to get there children to school because there tired and on Friday children can’t be bothered to come into school for the last day so by letting children come in on Monday and Friday would really help all parents out

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when to allow students not to wear school uniform are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban uniform in schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628871
